title: kurai tIra
sahitya:
kurai tIra unniDam muraiyiDum enniDam karuNai kUra uLLam uruguvAi murugA


anupallavi

  sirai mITkavE surar muraiyITTuk-kiranginai parai shATri adanai bhaktar pOTrum ayyanE


caraNam    karai sErap-pAyum alai kaDal pOl varai illAda karuNaiyin uruvAna perimaikk-uriyavanE
tirumAlin marumaghanAi trishUlan maghanAi dInar paripAlanAi mOna guruvum AvOnE
